Swish 1.13

  • General compatibility with macOS 26 (Tahoe) and a new Liquid Glass app icon.
  • Restored tab detection for Safari 26.
  • Restored tab detection for Chrome and Brave related to a recent change in Chromium. Unfortunately, tab detection for Microsoft Edge cannot be restored.
  • Added tab detection for Dia browser.
  • Fixed a bug where gestures would not work on a Catalyst appâ€™s dock icon.
  • Fixed a bug where some windows could not be moved between spaces.
  • Fixed a bug where windows from applications with an additional "Script" menu could not be tiled natively.
  • Fixed a bug where windows from applications using the JUCE framework were not recognized properly.

Swish 1.12

  • Added Stage Manager auto-detection and a custom offset slider for its recent apps area.
  • Synced grid spacing when â€˜Sequoia Window Tilingâ€™ is enabled.
  • Improved window detection for apps that block the Accessibility API (e.g. Adobe and Affinity).
  • Improved speed of the â€˜Minimize/Unminimize Allâ€™ menubar gesture.
  • Added Dock gesture support for apps that do not have a macOS app bundle ID.
  • Fixed a bug where windows would be re-snapped erroneously after exiting fullscreen mode.
  • Fixed a crash when interacting with unbundled symlinked applications launched via Terminal.

Swish 1.11

  • Added the option to use macOS Sequoiaâ€™s native window tiling for 2Ã—2 snapping.
  • Even smoother live tooltip animation.
  • Disabled gestures on scrollable sliders in toolbars, e.g. in Music.app.
  • Fixed a bug where Swish would crash when minimizing its own settings window.
